title: Micro-Meditation
description: Sit comfortably and focus on the physical sensations of your breath for a few minutes.

title: Desk Stretches
description: Gentle neck rolls, shoulder shrugs, and wrist circles to release tension.

title: Quick Walk
description: Step outside for a brief walk around the block. Fresh air and movement combined.

title: Coffee Chat
description: Grab a drink with a colleague and catch up on non-work topics.

title: Eye Rest
description: Follow the 20-20-20 rule: every 20 mins, look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds.

title: Power Nap
description: A 10-20 minute nap to restore alertness without grogginess.

title: Gratitude Moment
description: Write down or think about three things you're grateful for today.

title: Team Check-in
description: Brief informal chat with team members about how everyone's doing.

title: Standing Break
description: Stand up and work for 15 minutes. Change your posture and perspective.

title: Music Break
description: Listen to a favorite song or two. Let the music shift your mood.

title: Lunch with Friend
description: Share a meal with someone you enjoy. Conversation and food together.

title: Deep Breathing
description: 4-7-8 breathing: inhale for 4 counts, hold for 7, exhale for 8. Repeat 4 times.

title: Stair Climb
description: Walk up and down a few flights of stairs to get your blood moving.

title: Doodle Time
description: Grab a pen and paper. Doodle freely without any goal or purpose.

title: Phone a Friend
description: Quick call to someone you haven't talked to in a while.

title: Nature View
description: Find a window with a view of trees, sky, or greenery. Just observe for a few minutes.

title: Yoga Poses
description: Simple poses like child's pose, cat-cow, and forward fold to release tension.

title: Mindful Snack
description: Eat something healthy slowly, focusing on taste and texture.

title: Group Walk
description: Invite colleagues for a walking meeting or casual stroll.

title: Screen-Free Zone
description: Step away from all screens. Sit quietly or look out a window.

title: Hand Massage
description: Gently massage your hands and fingers. Great for desk workers.

title: Podcast Snippet
description: Listen to a short segment of an interesting podcast.

title: Virtual Coffee
description: Schedule a brief video call with a remote colleague for casual chat.

title: Jumping Jacks
description: Quick burst of 20-30 jumping jacks to boost energy.

title: Journal Prompt
description: Write freely for 5 minutes about how you're feeling right now.

title: Tea Ceremony
description: Mindfully prepare and enjoy a cup of tea, focusing on each step.

title: Desk Declutter
description: Spend a few minutes organizing your workspace. Clear space, clear mind.

title: Compliment Someone
description: Give a genuine compliment to a colleague. Connection through kindness.

title: Photo Break
description: Step outside and take a photo of something interesting or beautiful.

title: Body Scan
description: Mentally scan from head to toe, noticing areas of tension and consciously relaxing them.
